alert.note: Alert for Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 2:55PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Elko and central Eureka Counties through 330 PM PDT... At 255 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles southwest of Pine Valley, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Brief heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Elko and central Eureka Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County
